message.body: so I figure whoever get's their first tomorrow just find a lot and then call/text the other which lot you are in
I was thinking...this weekend is pretty week on CFB games. And every time I think that, there is some HUGE upset. So why not us this time around
Sounds good. Should we pick one to try and get into that one?
I just need to avoid the ND game
I think just eyeball it when you get there
Yup. I'm going to record that one too
I was reading that not all lots will be open
it is pretty easy to go between lots once you get there too
so I say just show up, find a spot and then call the other person and let em know where you are
Cool...I think it should be pretty open...whoever gets there first should run some interference if possible so we can get spaces next to each other
for the GIants game last year it wasn't really really full until a couple hours before
i think i read that somewhere
the entire 3rd deck is shut down
and they are selling tickets for dirt cheap in the 2nd and even first level endzones
Man...thats weak sauce...hopefully they are all Cuse fans.
did you let Amy know the details?
if not I can shoot a quick email
I have an email open so I can do it
just wasn't sure if you already had
Or you know what, better to send a group email just saying what time we are meeting and you got the food and I got The drinks
i mean everyone pretty much kows but amy at this point right?
Yeah, I've told Katie and Ted
But this way everyone feels included
I shot amy an email. You can do a group email, but I think everyone knows
Yup...the hype and thinking about the coming weekend is half the excitement for me
Like my countdown to 3-man football weekend
you catch any of that pittiful BE game last night?
the talent in the BE is pretty bad
munchie legeux is bad by most conf standards
Totally --- kid can't throw or shit
But I hear he can't shit too
how much did your total come to yesterday?
make sure ted and katie don't go too crazy on the hoagies
burgers, dogs and hoagies for 10 peeps - wont need too much
Getting ice will push that to 70ish
Yeah, I said get like 4 hoagies and we can cut them into smaller prices
yeah I just figured we would not include the 6ers
Other thought is we can bring leftover hoagies into the stadium
grab a beer and a bite as we wait for the initial rush out of the parking lot
I'm going to get two big bags of ice. Stock my cooler with as much beer as possible...then out just ice in another cooler and then people can use that for getting sodas and waters cold
well I am brining a cooler too
so you may not need two
because I have to keep some food cold
but other than that it will be relatively empty
Should be able to get at least a 30 pack in there to start
you guys are bringing the bag game right?
is joey bringing his sat boom box? or is it boken?
we are picking him up at his house
is that a part of the "no driving" initiative?
no, he was going to come up to our house tonight and crash, but we are having dinner with some friends
then he was going to come over Saturday night after the game and watch games on Sunday, but the Jets and Eagles play at the same time, so it just didn't work out
Ms still with a half game lead
yeah, I'm pumped for the Eagles year
cause I want to get a good night sleep tonight
I'm going to probably get drunk tonight, so I need to get to sleep at a decent hour though I'm going to be so hyped that probably won't happen
you know what I just thought of...we didn't get anything like a veggie plate for the ladies...should we grab one of those?
so what's the breakdown looking like a person?
without the hoagies it is like $14 a person
still that will be super cheap...cause Joey's the only non-drinker right?
yeah I was just about to say that
and then just figure out what the hoagies cost
I can pick up a veggie tray
hoagies are like 8-10 depending on the hoagie Katie said
does your bose work off batteries?
but we do have portable iPod speakers that are solid
I can get sat radio on my phone
so we can just do that
forecast makes it look like we will be in the stadium for any storms...that wouldn't be that bad then
give me your prediction on tomorrow's score
so you have USC covering, I have Cuse covering
as long as we keep them under 50 and we get at least 20
but l'm going with that "crappy weekends always produce a big upset" theory
lynch took some carries in yesterday's practive
but supposedly looked 100% in the few carries he did have
dude, I'm totally taking Savannah State
i mean OK State put up 80 points
they can lose 70-0 and still cover
so last week the line was 65
they could lose 65-0 and still cover
bunk's a hater these days...nothing but storm-colored glasses...only seahawk's-colored glasses
I am definitely a hater on cuse
but how is what I said not correct
they dont just throw out bogus lines
so yeah it seems crazy to have a 70 point line
but it seeed crazy last week at 65
I am not good at it
hahaha...bunk you are taking this way too seriously
so who you takin this weekend?
I'm thinking a 3-team tease in football
let me sign into my account and get the latest lines
how many points are you asking for?
damn--the FSU game isn't on the board
i like a Georgia and ND parlay
how many points to you are getting?
what do you think of this 4-team NFL
is this with the 5 points already
i can set as a Risk
or I can say I want to win 100
and then I'd have to be like 30
what does that risk or to win mean?
or chose what you want to win
2. set the amount you want to win (risk)
Seattle the only road team in that area
and I'm basically got them all down to wins
i don't know if I'm going to bet CFB
I'm thinking I might parlay ND and Georgia
can you do a two team?
+107 for a two-team tease getting 5 points though
cmon I thought you were going with savana state
but in the teaser you would get it to 70
it ws a no brainer 5 min ago
nope, you talked me out of it
is it wrong to bet against your own team?
cause I can get USC at + 20.5
the theory is also, if I do that...Cuse is sure to cover...maybe win
or is that a crime of my fandom?
or I could take Cuse at +31.5
dude, your survivor name is AMAZING
you need to send who they are against
too much work to go look up every game
i dont think it is a crime to bet against
also you kind of cover yourself
still got beat pretty good and you lose money
I don't they we are THAT much worse than USC
mainly cause USC's defense isn't lights out like years past
and you are really going to say we can somewhat compete with #2 team in teh country
why didn't you tell me that previously???
I wish I could remember what Kristen said
someting like "is that the same Nassib at Syracuse?"
one thing going...he does have a strong arm...and experience...but that's it
I wouldn't be surprised if he gets drafted late or makes a practice squad
i mean shit...Mike Kafka was our #2
i think you read that backwards
so as long as they don't lose to ND State...my more than 10
i think you read that backward
not with the 10.5 points i get on the tease
i mean you read it as if I put any amount of thought into aside from the matchup of the mascots
so a 12 - teamer CFB at $10 to win $110
and a 4-team NFL teaser to win $77.50
if I win either bet...a case of something awesome on me for the 3-man weekend
and something to root for now
you don't need to bring your ipod speaker
we are going to shock the college football world tomorrow
as 36.5 point dogs...we are going to cover the shit out of that shit
are you getting 36.5 from your place?
but we are going to win
Sir Alec Lemon will catch 5 TDs
I'm calling the Silas Redd critical fumble
Broyld is going to have 150 all purpuse hards
Shamarko is going to knockout Barkley in the 1Q
you watch any of the DNC?
not sure if you saw his
Obama's speech was just whatver in my opinion
it is funny to see how fanatical people are at those things
but I guess the same could be said about people at sports games
I don't know how you lean politically...but the thing that struck me the most is the shared responsibility of the democratic platform
I don't see how anyone disagrees with that based on the the economic policy the Repubs will put forward (and that Ryan has basically constructed)
yeah although, super hard core republicans want no involvment of the government in fiscal policy
or the least amount of involvment as possible
yeah...any extremists on either side are crazy
just not the way the world works
but I have had discussions with very intelligent people who really beliee that

see I'll never feel that way and yes they can be smart and believe in that form of govt (or lack thereof), but then what happens to the poor, elderly, and sick? they are just left out--survival of the fittest?
i think with anything in life
I always just think about what would have happened if I didn't have insurance and was sick...or I couldn't get insurance because of a pre-existing condition
and the people you see in a city hospital's cancer ward -- no way all of them have good insurance...so many of them are on medicare/caid
there's no way I would say "I don't want to pay a tax for that"
and I think that is necessary even though you have others that will abuse it
you can reform healthcare to lower costs...the reform shouldn't be killing medicare to eliminate the cost
I do believe in a lot of privatization though
I just really have a problem with the polar bipartisan stance that politics have become
it is two extreme sides not working for a middle ground
each side wanting to be right
Clinton spoke to that a little
Obama did a bit too much of the negative republican rhetoric for my liking
I just wish someone would rise up above it
not get caught in the shit storm
I think I will probably vote for Obama again, if only just because I think we need some stability and 4 years is not enough to straighten out the situation he walked into
I certainly agree with the last point
for me I can't fathom the ideology of this republican platform
speaking of stupid people like Mitt Romney--Erin's sister drafted the 49ers in like the 5th round of our fantasy league, so I just scooped them up
ryan moore in a great spot
he needs to get it going
making a nice living, but needs the breakthrough
have you seen him recently? he's got a nice golfer's gut going on
he is defiitely living the good life
must be that new wife cooking for him
if I remember correctly she is
I think she played volleball at UNLF
so I was just curious how Kansas did in week one with Wies and Crist
they opened at home against South Dakota State
as long as they beat Rice
shoot for lot G if im not there yet
